member.name: T:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata
member.summary: Contains Metadata helper methods.

remarks.para: The Metadata is stored in tables to allow for design of the tables separate from the actual creation of the tables.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.#ctor(LJCDBClientLib.DbServiceRef,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes an object instance.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetCreateTableSql(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Builds and returns the Create Table SQL statement from the Metadata.
member.param: Indicates if the Foreign Key constraints are to be included.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetCreateTableSql(System.String,LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.DbMetaDataColumns,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Builds and returns the Create Table SQL statement with the specified Metadata columns.
member.param: Indicates if the Foreign Key constraints

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetCreateColumnSql(LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.DbMetaDataColumns)
member.summary: Creates and returns the Column Definitions SQL for the Create Table SQL statement from the Metadata.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetSqlDbTypeName(System.String)
member.summary: Get the .NET to SQL data type names.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetPrimaryKeyConstraintSql(System.String)
member.summary: Creates and returns the Primary Key Constraint SQL for the Create Table SQL statement from the Metadata.
member.returns: The Primary Key Constraint SQL string.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetForeignKeyConstraintSql(System.String,LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.DbMetaDataColumns)
member.summary: Creates and returns the Foreign Key Constraing SQL for the foreign keys.
member.returns: The Foreign Key Constraints SQL string.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.GetRemakeTableScript(System.String,LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.DbMetaDataColumns,LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.DbMetaDataColumns)
member.summary: Remake table with new column names and/or column sequences.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.UpdateMetadataFromSchema(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates/Updates the Metadata from the Schema data.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.SaveMdTable(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the MD Table from the table name.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.SaveMdColumn(System.Int32,System.Int32,LJCNetCommon.DbColumn)
member.summary: Saves the MD Column from the DbColumn object.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.SaveMdKey(LJCSQLUtilLibDAL.ForeignKey)
member.summary: Saves the MD Key from the ForeignKey object.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.LoadSchemaPrimaryKeys(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a collection of Primary Key data records.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.LoadSchemaForeignKeys(System.String)
member.summary: Loads a collection of Foreign Key data records.

member.name: M:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.InitializeData
member.summary: Configures the controls and loads the selection control data.

member.name: P:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.MdTableManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the MdTableManager value.

member.name: P:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.MdColumnManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the MdColumnManager value.

member.name: P:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.MdKeyManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the MdKeyManager value.

member.name: P:LJCSQLUtilLib.LJCMetadata.ForeignKeyManager
member.summary: Gets or sets the ForeignKeyManager value.
